questions: How to send an SMS using the Twilio gateway with ThamesThrive?
What is the plugin used to send an SMS using the Twilio gateway with ThamesThrive?
Can ThamesThrive send an SMS using the Twilio gateway?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive send an SMS using the Twilio gateway?
Yes, ThamesThrive can send an SMS using the Twilio gateway using the "Send SMS" plugin
